context.rdfs:comment:
Describes a reservation for travel, dining or an event. Some reservations require tickets.

Note: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations. For offers of tickets, restaurant reservations, flights, or rental cars, use Offer.
context.rdfs:label: Reservation

properties.rdfs:comment: Any membership in a frequent flyer, hotel loyalty program, etc. being applied to the reservation.
properties.rdfs:label: programMembershipUsed

properties.rdfs:comment: The current status of the reservation.
properties.rdfs:label: reservationStatus

properties.rdfs:comment: 'bookingAgent' is an out-dated term indicating a 'broker' that serves as a booking agent.
properties.rdfs:label: bookingAgent

properties.rdfs:comment: The thing -- flight, event, restaurant,etc. being reserved.
properties.rdfs:label: reservationFor

properties.rdfs:comment: The date and time the reservation was modified.
properties.rdfs:label: modifiedTime

properties.rdfs:comment: The date and time the reservation was booked.
properties.rdfs:label: bookingTime

properties.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the reservation.
properties.rdfs:label: reservationId

properties.rdfs:comment: A ticket associated with the reservation.
properties.rdfs:label: reservedTicket
